author: Simon Difford
description: Bourbon and rye whiskies form a robust base with hints of both maraschino and cherry brandy liqueurs adding flavour and richness alongside Italian vermouth.
name: Sweet Manhattan (batched recipe)
recipeIngredient: 300 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
10 ml Angostura or other aromatic bitters
5 ml Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients and stir (without ice)
POUR into a litre bottle and leave to chill in a refrigerator
To serve, STIR 2 shots / 2oz / 60ml of the bottled mixture with ice and strain into chilled glass
This recipe is also perfect for making a barrel aged Manhattan and will fill a one litre mini cask
Obviously, multiply recipe if using a larger cask
